Uses of Interface
javax.imageio.ImageTranscoder

Packages that use ImageTranscoder
javax.imageio The main package of the Java Image I/O API. 
javax.imageio.spi A package of the Java Image I/O API containing the plug-in interfaces for readers, writers, transcoders, and streams, and a runtime registry. 
 

Uses of ImageTranscoder in javax.imageio
 

Classes in javax.imageio that implement ImageTranscoder
 class ImageWriter
          An abstract superclass for encoding and writing images.
 

Methods in javax.imageio that return types with arguments of type ImageTranscoder
static Iterator<ImageTranscoder> ImageIO.getImageTranscoders(ImageReader reader, ImageWriter writer)
          Returns an Iterator containing all currently registered ImageTranscoders that claim to be able to transcode between the metadata of the given ImageReader and ImageWriter.
 

Uses of ImageTranscoder in javax.imageio.spi
 

Methods in javax.imageio.spi that return ImageTranscoder
abstract  ImageTranscoder ImageTranscoderSpi.createTranscoderInstance()
          Returns an instance of the ImageTranscoder implementation associated with this service provider.
